title: A quick look at the Switch’s new Game Boy and Game Boy Advance emulation

title: Earthquake deaths top 20,000 as survivors face cholera, other health threats
description: WHO warns of "secondary crisis" as water disinfection tablets ship alongside trauma kits.

title: Valve waited 15 months to patch high-severity flaw. A hacker pounced
description: Vulnerability had a 8.8 severity rating. Valve took its time patching anyway.

title: Study: Mexican jumping beans use random walk strategy to find shade
description: It's not the fastest strategy, but it maximizes the likelihood of success.

description: Updated for 2023: Still on Intel? We revisit a primer on your M1/M2 options.

title: FCC approves Amazon’s satellite broadband plan over SpaceX’s objections
description: Amazon's 3,236-satellite plan greenlit despite SpaceX seeking 578-satellite limit.

title: Controlled experiments show MDs dismissing evidence due to ideology
description: When it comes to evaluating COVID treatments, MDs are only human.

title: Man sells $38 part to enable AirPods Pro case self-repairs, USB-C connectivity
description: If he can do it, why won't Apple?

title: Android’s upcoming “app cloning” feature will make multiple accounts easy
description: Cloned apps would leverage Android's multi-user system to have duplicate app icons.

title: Redwood gets $2 billion commitment from DoE for recycled batteries
description: The company has already started producing copper-anode foil from recycled cells.

title: Want to delete your Twitter DMs? Good luck with that

description: EU “disappointed” in Twitter fact-checking plan amid Russia disinfo campaigns.

title: The Chrysler Pacifica is still the best plug-in hybrid minivan on the market
description: It's also the only one. But it's still very good.

description: Company says future game pricing will be decided on a "case-by-case basis."

title: Autopilot had no involvement in fatal Texas Tesla crash, NTSB says
description: Alcohol and sedating antihistamines were to blame, according to crash investigator.

description: Comcast insisted false data was correct; error seems to affect dozens of homes.
